definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: profaned;—[[חָלָל רָשָׁע]] (rd. cstr. [[הֲלַל]] SS) profaned, dishonoured wicked one Ez Eze 21:30 (so AV Thes MV SS Co Or; but RV Hä deadly wounded, Ew Sm fallen, slain); pl. cstr. [[חַלְלֵי רְשָׁעִים]] Ez Eze 21:29; fs. [[חֲלָלָה]] of woman sexually dishonoured Le 21:7, Le 21:14 (H; ‖[[זׇנׇה]]).
